Selina Boateng bụ onye si Ghana na-eti egwu ozioma.

Selina so onye amụma Albert Asihene-Arjarquah mee njem nlegharị anya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ụfọdụ n'afọ 2014. Ikike ya ịbụ abụ na French na Bekee enyewo ya ohere ije ozi na mba dị  iche iche dika France, Belgium, Norway na Germany. N'obodo, Selina anọwo na mmemme ya na ndị na eme ihe nkiri dịka DSP Kofi Sarpong, Nacee, Ceccy Twum, KODA, Joe Mettle, Eugene Zuta, Ohemaa Mercy na Rev Cynthia McCauley.
E nyere Selina onyinye nke afọ 2012 VGMA Gospel Song of the Year. O ritekwara ihe nrite anọ na Ghana Gospel Industry Awards (GGIA) (2nd Edition) nke Adom FMAdom FM mere

Ihe nrite ndị ahụ bụ maka Artiste of the Year, Album of the Year, Song of the Year ('Menku Meho') na Popular Video of the Year. Site na egwu ya 'Alpha & Omega' nke gosipụtara Uncle Ato, Selina ritere ihe nrite Gospel Song of the Year n'afọ 2015. N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara egwu TKC gosipụtara ya maka Urban Song of the Year ('Ayeyi' - nke pụtara Otuto).
Selina nwere  nanị otu nwanne ma l na alụ Isaac Berchie kemgbe ọnwa iri na abụọ n'afọ 2019.
